author: arj
msg: The Ant war/test war tasks were not always properly excluding test-related jars, such as Selenium. This was causing webapps to fail to load in some cases. These jars have now been moved to tests/lib.

author: arj
msg: Replaced jug-lgpl with the Apache-licensed version [JSPWIKI-41].

author: arj
msg: Adjusted the README file in lib to reflect reality.

author: arj
msg: Resolved [JSPWIKI-33] by removing all external class dependencies in WikiBackgroundThread (other than JSPWiki.jar classes). Also changed the default webtests-teardown task in Ant so that web unit tests are taken down unless the 'webtests.keepup' property is set.
